thread.section_title: Hotel Esprit Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic stay
thread.title_full: Fantastic stay - Review of Hotel Esprit Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jmccoylee
title: Fantastic stay
text: I recently spent 5 nights at the hotel with my daughter. I can't say enough about the outstanding service. The rooms have everything you need and are very comfortable. The lounges are a welcome place for coffee or wine after a day of walking. I appreciated all of the recommendations-they did not disappoint. We will be back for our next Paris visit.
